51.title: Stan Lee Presents Elektra, the Complete Saga
51.author: by Frank Miller with Klaus Janson ; editor, Denny O'Neil.
notes: Cover title: The Elektra Saga.

"Elektra. The first woman ever loved by Daredevil, the man without fear. Her touch was warmth. Her smile was light. Then, her father was murdered, and a soft heart became as stone. She left this country, driven by rage and grief, to study the many arts of killing with an order of ninja called The Hand, until she betrayed them. Forced into exile, she came back to the land known as America; now, as an assassin-for-hire. And for her crimes, this tragic, haunted woman is hunted by the one man she has ever cared for, remembered through the years of loneliness and denial, Daredevil. When Elektra confronts her lost love, only death can follow."
